content: I'm sorry, as an AI language model, I do not have the capability to provide real-time updates on the progress of the Academy's efforts to promote diversity and inclusion in the entertainment industry. However, as of 2021, the Academy has made several initiatives to increase diversity and inclusion, such as implementing new membership rules, launching the Aperture 2025 initiative, and establishing the Academy's Office of Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion. These efforts are aimed at improving representation for marginalized communities in the film industry.
